summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Rosary prayer tracking app redesign. All major features tested successfully including dark/light themes, navigation, responsive design, and content pages.
passed_tests: Landing page hero section renders correctly in both light and dark mode
Theme toggle works and persists user preference across page reloads
Floating pill navbar displays correctly at bottom on desktop with all navigation links
Mobile navbar header appears on small screens with working menu toggle
Navigation links work correctly - In√≠cio, Sobre, Comunidade sections scroll smoothly
Navigation to all content pages works: /como-rezar, /historia, /misterios-do-dia, /oracoes-tradicionais
Bento grid layout displays correctly with all 4 cards visible and clickable
Content pages have proper headers and back navigation functionality
Dark/Light mode styling works correctly on all pages with proper color contrast
CTA buttons have gold styling and hover effects working
Glass-morphism effects applied correctly on 8+ elements
Cinzel font properly applied to headings, Manrope font applied to body text
Footer navigation links work correctly for all content pages
Responsive design works on desktop (1920x1080), tablet (768x1024), and mobile (390x844)
Animation classes and hover effects working correctly
Theme persistence works across page reloads
